ads.infobar: Boost ROI with branded ad slots & white-label embeds.

hero.title: Deliver lightweight videos with studio-grade alpha channels.
hero.description: Drag and drop media to remove white or chroma backgrounds, balance bitrate, and ship ready-to-stream assets in seconds. TransparaStream optimises FFmpeg pipelines so you can focus on storytelling.

upload.title: Drop files here or browse
upload.description: Supports MP4, MOV, WebM, GIF up to 1 GiB. Background removal presets are applied automatically and can be fine-tuned after upload.
upload.note: No sign-up required for 3 free jobs per day.

presets.name: Ultra Compress
presets.description: CRF 38 · 480p · Aggressive denoise and color key

presets.name: GIF to WebP
presets.description: Palette dithering, loop preserved, lighter spritesheet

features.title: Purpose-built for transparent video delivery.
features.intro: Modern rendering, rich observability, and flexible outputs for every channel.

items.title: Adaptive FFmpeg pipelines
items.description: We stitch color-key, denoise, and alphamerge filters dynamically based on your footage histogram.

items.title: Per-output intelligence
items.description: Choose WebM, H.264, AV1, WebP, or GIF with tuned CRF and audio bitrates for each audience.

items.title: Audit-ready logs
items.description: Every job ships with verbose FFmpeg logs and probe snapshots for compliance teams.

items.title: Team workspaces
items.description: Invite editors, define presets, and review side-by-side diffs before publishing.

apiPromo.title: Integrate background-aware compression into your workflow.
apiPromo.description: Our REST API mirrors the UI presets so your product, DAM, or automation can process footage at scale. Queue jobs, stream logs, and use signed webhooks to pull finished WebP, WebM, or MP4 bundles into your pipeline.
benefits: Usage analytics and per-key rate limiting
apiPromo.codeSample:
curl -X POST https://api.transparastream.com/v1/process \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -F preset=web-optimized \
  -F outWebp=true -F outWebm=true \
  -F file=@studio-demo.mov -o result.zip

testimonials.title: Designed for editors, product teams, and automation.

items.quote: We ship episodic content to sixteen platforms weekly. TransparaStream cut our prep time by 60% and the alpha channel stays pristine.
items.author: Lina Ozturk
items.role: Head of Post Production, FrameLab Studio

items.quote: Transparent GIF-to-WebP conversion used to be a support nightmare. Now the marketing team drags and drops assets without asking engineering.
items.author: Jon Ruiz

pricing.title: Scale from solo creator to enterprise distribution.

pricingPage.title: Pick the plan that fits your workflow
pricingPage.subtitle: Flexible tiers support everything from quick experiments to enterprise delivery pipelines.
features: Transparent alpha retention across all outputs
Queue monitoring with webhook status updates
Role-based access control and workspace invites

faqs.question: Can I switch plans at any time?
faqs.answer: Yes, upgrades and downgrades take effect immediately and your usage balance carries over.

faqs.question: Do you offer volume discounts?
faqs.answer: Studio and Enterprise plans include tiered pricing once you exceed your included minutes.

faqs.question: Is there an API sandbox?
faqs.answer: All plans include a sandbox environment with separate credentials and throttled quotas.

pricingPage.contactDescription: Our solutions team can design dedicated regions, hybrid rendering, and tailored SLAs.

videoPage.title: Smarter transparent video compression
videoPage.subtitle: Optimise frame-by-frame with presets designed for alpha-sensitive footage.

workflows.title: WebM alpha for product demos
workflows.description: Balanced CRF and VP9 tuning keep overlays crisp across browsers.

workflows.title: Live stream lower thirds
workflows.description: Generate transparent HEVC clips ready for OBS and hardware switchers.

workflows.title: Mobile promo reels
workflows.description: Deliver lightning-fast MP4 exports with automatic loudness normalisation.

imagePage.title: Crystal-clear transparent image pipelines
imagePage.subtitle: Optimise sprites, UI exports, and marketing assets without losing alpha fidelity.

workflows.title: Brand asset export
workflows.description: Batch convert layered PSDs into WebP with preserved transparency.

workflows.title: Icon sprite optimisation
workflows.description: Compress icon sheets while aligning pixel ratios for crisp rendering.

workflows.title: Marketplace pack preparation
workflows.description: Normalize color profiles and trim whitespace before publishing.

soundPage.title: Streamlined transparent audio processing
soundPage.subtitle: Clean voiceovers, optimise music beds, and balance loudness for any channel.

options.title: Dialogue isolate
options.description: Remove room noise while keeping natural vocal tone for dubbing workflows.

options.title: Spatial mixdowns
options.description: Downmix surround stems to stereo while preserving clarity for mobile devices.

options.title: Podcast enhancer
options.description: Apply loudness normalisation, EQ, and dynamic levelling in one pass.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for might have been moved or is temporarily unavailable.
